task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_title: Innovatech Employee Wellness: Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break Interest Survey
task_1_interest_survey_design.survey_introduction_text: Innovatech Solutions is committed to enhancing employee well-being. We are considering introducing a 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' and would greatly value your input to tailor this potential program to your needs. Please take a few minutes to complete this short survey.

survey_questions.question_text: How interested are you in participating in a 15-20 minute guided 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' offered twice a week?
Which days of the week would you be most likely to attend a mid-day session? (Select all that apply)
What time of day would be most convenient for you to participate in a 15-20 minute session? (Select your top preference)
What aspects of a 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' appeal to you most? (Select all that apply)
On a scale of 1 to 5 (where 1 is Very Low and 5 is Very High), how would you rate your typical stress level during the workday?
Do you have any specific suggestions or preferences for the proposed 'Mid-day Mindfulness & Stretching Break' program (e.g., specific types of activities, duration preferences, etc.)?

task_2_satisfaction_data_analysis.recommendation_for_next_year: To improve next year's Step Challenge, focus on offering more prize categories and enhancing the mobile app. Also, consider participant feedback regarding the challenge duration, as some found it too long.
